tool_description: Create an account, fund an account, manage a catalog, send rewards and get reporting — all available on demand, in real time and as a service. With our RaaS® API, you can elegantly knit a sophisticated rewards program into your platform. Best of all, the service has zero fees.
name: Rewards as a Service
title: Rewards as a Service

api_list.name: 4. Get list of rewards
api_list.description: Gets the list of rewards available for the platform
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/rewards"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the list of rewards available on the platform?
What rewards are currently offered by the platform?
Please provide a list of all the rewards I can send to my users.
I need to see the available rewards for my rewards program.
Could you fetch the list of rewards that I can integrate into my platform?
What are the rewards options I can choose from for my users?
Show me the rewards catalog for the platform.
Can you retrieve the list of rewards that are available for distribution?
I’d like to see the rewards that are part of the rewards program.
What rewards can I send to my users through the platform?

api_list.name: 2. Get Account Information
api_list.description: Get the information for an account created under a Customer

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the account information for account ID 12345 under customer Acme Corp?
I need the details for account 67890 associated with customer Global Enterprises.
Please fetch the account information for account ID ABC123 under customer Tech Solutions.
Retrieve the account details for account ID XYZ789 for customer Innovate Inc.
Could you get the account information for account ID DEF456 under customer Bright Future?
I need the account details for account ID GHI789 for customer Smart Tech.
Please provide the account information for account ID JKL012 under customer Next Gen.
Can you fetch the account details for account ID MNO345 associated with customer Future Vision?
Retrieve the account information for account ID PQR678 under customer Advanced Solutions.
I need the account details for account ID STU901 for customer Modern Innovations.

api_list.name: 6. Get order information
api_list.description: Get more information about an order

utterances.utterance: Can you provide details about order number 12345?
I need information on order ID 67890.
Please fetch the details for order 54321.
What is the status of order 98765?
Could you retrieve information for order 11223?
I'd like to know more about order 33445.
Can you check the details for order 55667?
Please provide the information for order 77889.
What are the details for order 99001?
I need to see the information for order 22334.

api_list.name: 7. Get order history
api_list.description: Get more information about all the orders placed on this customer and account

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the order history for customer John Doe with account identifier 12345?
I need the order history for customer Jane Smith with account identifier 67890.
Please fetch the order history for customer Alice Johnson with account identifier 54321.
Get the order history for customer Bob Brown with account identifier 98765.
Retrieve the order history for customer Carol White with account identifier 11223.
Can you provide the order history for customer David Green with account identifier 33445, starting from January 1, 2023?
I need the order history for customer Eve Black with account identifier 55667, ending on December 31, 2023.
Please fetch the order history for customer Frank Blue with account identifier 77889, starting from March 1, 2023, and ending on March 31, 2023.
Get the order history for customer Grace Yellow with account identifier 99001, limited to the last 10 orders.
Retrieve the order history for customer Henry Orange with account identifier 22334, starting from the 11th order.

api_list.name: 5. Place an order for a reward
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/orders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com/orders"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: 1. Create an account

import requests

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tangocard-rewards-as-a-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
